description.en:
Sunflower Finance is the first project on the BSC system that has the function of creating development funds for potential projects - Seeds Tank. Our target is to build the largest technology ecosystem in BSC and to render SFO (sunflowerfi.org) the top 1 token BEP-20 in the DEFI sector within one year.

Sunflower Finance seeks out small to medium-sized projects with great development potential and then offers financial capital for them in exchange for a portion of their products to be distributed to SFO holders
